duplicateElement.message: Elements with the same name attribute exist

duplicateForm.message: Two or more Forms exist on the screen

hiddenOptionLabel.message: hidden is now also included in the copy/paste target

storageOption.message: Keep a separate copy for each URL

storageOptionLabel.message: Keep a separate copy for each URL. (*Except for the get parameter.) Pasting is also done for each URL.

copyPasteBtnLabel.message: Copy and Paste buttons appear in the lower right corner of the screen, also controlled by Alt + P

flashMessageLabel.message: If a form exists that cannot be copied and pasted, a message is displayed. also controlled by Alt + M

description.message: Alt + i to copy form values, Alt + o to paste them into a form; Alt + p to show/hide the copy and paste buttons.

pasteBtnDescription.message: Paste the copied values into the Form
